settings.heading: What Makes Undaria Body Butter So Effective
settings.paragraph: Meet the powerful key ingredients that make it workPowerful ingredients make it work

Undaria Seaweed

Replenishes skin's moisture barrier and keeps it looking healthy.

Shea Butter

Revives dry skin leaving it soft, smooth, and deeply moisturized.

DPHP (Dipalmitoyl Hydroxyproline)

Plant-derived amino acid firms skin and leaves it feeling supple.

Ceramides (Oat Kernel Extract)

Moisturizes, renews, and supports skin’s own moisture barrier.

Skin Identical Moisturizing Complex (Saccharide Isomerate)

Provides deep hydration for healthier-looking skin.

settings.heading: Step 1
settings.paragraph: Use our Plant-Based Body Brush to dry brush your entire body.

settings.heading: Step 2
settings.paragraph: Take a bath with our luxurious Vagus Nerve Bath Oil.

settings.heading: Step 3
settings.paragraph: Exfoliate your body with our mineral-rich Salts of the Earth.

settings.heading: Step 4
settings.paragraph: Finish with our Body Butter for flawless, supple skin.
